markings: Numbered in pen on colophon page: No 82
medium: Photocopied reproductions and screenprinted text on translucent paper, with handwoven kassai cloth mounted on black paper covers
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pen on colophon page: Susanne Wenger
text: For 45 years, Austrian artist Susanne Wenger lived in the African nation of Nigeria, where she honed her artistic practice and served as a priest in Yoruba religious ceremonies. This journal-like artist’s book presents a dynamic visual account of Wenger’s inner thoughts during her spiritual practice of meditation. The combination of calligraphic text and gestural drawings lends the book a sense of spontaneity, immediacy, and mystery.
title: Transkreatürliche Osmosen
